name: The Floor is Spiders
description:
The Floor is Spiders is a game made in 2 days for Mini Jam 123 with the limitation of "There is No Ground" Well there is ground, but it's spiders. most people don't want to stand on spiders. If people like this, I might expand on it in the future!

If you can't see the score, its a screensize issue that I didn't have time to fix in the jam.

WASD to move

Mouse to look

Space to Jump
